languages.text: "Искусство охоты опирается на искусство сокрытия. Вы не видите цель... Сделайте так, чтобы и цель не видела вас. Обманите его чувства и получите преимущество".
"The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."
languages.original_text: "Искусство охоты опирается на искусство сокрытия. Вы не видите цель... Сделайте так, чтобы и цель не видела вас. Обманите его чувства и получите преимущество".

traits.locale_text: "My hypothesis: the unknown variable is an ancient form of life and intelligence. The xeno-variable is the cause of multiple paradoxes of Vheabos-VI. It is recommended to study the specimen and its abnormal properties before committing the act of cleansing xenocide. The sacred brotherhood of the Explorators will help catch the variable in exchange for the knowledge contained within the specimen."

"My hypothesis: the unknown variable is an ancient form of life and intelligence. The xeno-variable is the cause of multiple paradoxes of Vheabos-VI. It is recommended to study the specimen and its abnormal properties before committing the act of cleansing xenocide. The sacred brotherhood of the Explorators will help catch the variable in exchange for the knowledge contained within the specimen."
"The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."
"The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

"The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

languages.text: “狩猎的艺术依赖于隐藏的艺术。你看不到你的目标……但你也可以让它看不见你。欺骗它的感官，从中获得优势。”
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

traits.locale_text: “狩猎的艺术依赖于隐藏的艺术。你看不到你的目标……但你也可以让它看不见你。欺骗它的感官，从中获得优势。”

languages.text: «El arte de la caza se basa en el arte de esconderse. No puedes ver a tu objetivo... entonces haz que el objetivo no pueda verte. Engaña sus sentidos y aprovecha tu ventaja».
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

traits.locale_text: «El arte de la caza se basa en el arte de esconderse. No puedes ver a tu objetivo... entonces haz que el objetivo no pueda verte. Engaña sus sentidos y aprovecha tu ventaja».

languages.text: 「狩猟の技術は隠れる技術に大きく左右されるんだ。こちらから獲物は見えない...そして獲物側からもこちらを見えないようにする。相手の感覚を欺き、優位に立つんだ」
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

traits.locale_text: 「狩猟の技術は隠れる技術に大きく左右されるんだ。こちらから獲物は見えない...そして獲物側からもこちらを見えないようにする。相手の感覚を欺き、優位に立つんだ」

languages.text: « L'art de la chasse dépend de celui du camouflage. Quand on ne peut voir sa cible, il faut faire en sorte qu'elle ne nous voie pas non plus. Dupez ses sens pour avoir l'avantage. »
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

traits.locale_text: « L'art de la chasse dépend de celui du camouflage. Quand on ne peut voir sa cible, il faut faire en sorte qu'elle ne nous voie pas non plus. Dupez ses sens pour avoir l'avantage. »

languages.text: "Die Kunst der Jagd basiert auf der Kunst des Versteckens. Ihr könnt Euer Ziel nicht sehen ... dann sorgt dafür, dass das Ziel auch Euch nicht sehen kann. Täuscht seine Sinne und nutzt Euren Vorteil."
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kunst der Jagd basiert auf der Kunst des Versteckens. Ihr könnt Euer Ziel nicht sehen ... dann sorgt dafür, dass das Ziel auch Euch nicht sehen kann. Täuscht seine Sinne und nutzt Euren Vorteil."

languages.text: "Av sanatı, gizlenme sanatına dayar sırtını. Hedefini göremiyorsan... Hedefin de seni görememeli. Algılarını aldatıp üstünlüğü ele alacaksın."
languages.original_text: "The art of hunting relies on the art of hiding. You cannot see your target... then make it so the target cannot see you. Deceive its senses and seize your advantage."
